questions.question: 1. The unit weight of dry soil is greater than the unit weight of wet soil.
2. The unit weight of soil decreases due to submergence of water.
3. If the soil sample has a porosity of 30% and a specific gravity of solids G = 2.7, then its dry unit weight will be ______

explanations.a: Given, Porosity n=30%=0.3, Specific gravity G=2.7, Voids ratio e = n / (1-n), e=0.3/(1-0.3)=0.429, Dry unit weight γd = Gγw/(1-e), γd=(2.7*9.81)/(11+0.429), γd=18.535 kN/m3.
